text: The provisions of §§ 16-2332 and 16-2333 shall apply to all juvenile case records and juvenile social records as defined therein which are created pursuant to the proceedings under this subchapter.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

subchapter.text: Proceedings Regarding the Termination of Parental Rights of Certain Neglected Children.
